description: Zellogi wears a Native American headdress and has a hook in place of his left hand. He takes an interest in Ryuk`s activities in the human world, and humans in particular after learning that Ryuk`s Death Note is in a human`s possession. Despite his feeble appearance, he has a highly inquisitive nature. His interests are in furry items and he dislikes moist temperature.
name: Zellogi
